#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int memo[455][455][455], lena, lenb, lenc;
bool mark[455][455][455];
char a[455], b[455], c[455];

int DP(int i, int j, int k) {
	if(i >= lena || j >= lenb || k >= lenc) return 0;
	int &best = memo[i][j][k];
	if(mark[i][j][k]) return best;
	mark[i][j][k] = true;
	if(a[i] == b[j] && b[j] == c[k]) best = DP(i + 1, j + 1, k + 1) + 1;
	else {
		best = max(DP(i + 1, j, k), DP(i, j + 1, k));
		best = max(best, DP(i, j, k + 1));
	}
	return best;
}

int main() {
	int t; scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--) {
		scanf("%s %s %s", a, b, c);
		lena = strlen(a); lenb = strlen(b);
		lenc = strlen(c); memset(mark, false, sizeof(mark));
		printf("%d\n", lena + lenb + lenc - 3 * DP(0, 0, 0));
	}
	return 0;
}
